name: Resistance Band Exercises
description: Utilizing resistance bands to build strength and mobility in a functional way.

cards.title: Band-Resisted Squats for Lower Body Strength
cards.description: Using resistance bands to increase tension and engage stabilizer muscles.
bulletpoints: Keep feet shoulder-width apart and maintain good squat posture
Use a slow, controlled descent to maximize muscle activation
Increase resistance gradually to progress strength development
cards.summaryText: Sink into banded squats with tight posture so tension loads every rep.

cards.title: Resistance Band Rows for Upper Back Strength
cards.description: Strengthening the upper back and posture using resistance bands.
bulletpoints: Keep the chest upright and squeeze shoulder blades together
Control the movement to maintain tension throughout the pull
Adjust band tension for progressive overload
cards.summaryText: Row the bands with deliberate squeezes to sharpen upper-back strength.
